reviewText: Beautiful story, I have seen the original Korean movie and as much as I love the actors in that this is by far my favorite version
I can't get enough of these characters. I fell in love with them both. What a love story. I could watch it over and over again and I do!
One of the best movies and now one of my favorites. I ordered the movie but cannot watch it. Somehow the devices here in America don't work with products from Turkey.
Beautiful love story. For those who are wondering, this does not has English subtitles.
Incredibly touching film. I loved this movie.
Love the movie, such a great and powerful love story. Great actors. Respect the fact that there isn't any nudity in the movie. Watch it! You'll love it if you are a sucker for romance :)

I watched this movie on Netflix and loved it. Cried so much. Thought the ending was going to break my heart but it made my heart soar! Had to buy the DVDs because didn't know how long it would be on Netflix and definitely want to watch it again and again!
